title: Video: Youth Lagoon – 17
body:
There hasn’t really been an album in the last year that’s as ripe for a visual representation as **[Youth Lagoon’s](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/11492-review-youth-lagoon-the-year-of-hibernation/ "Review: Youth Lagoon – The Year Of Hibernation")** ‘**_The Year of Hibernation_**’. It started with **[Tyler T William’s](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/8399-exclusive-contact-grey-tyler-t-williams/ "Exclusive: Contact Grey – Tyler T Williams")** video for the incredible ‘**_Montana_**’. The video was at times harrowing, but rather delicately centred around a simple story of a young boy. This fan made video for ‘17’, a track from the same LP, directed by [**Kasey Lum**](http://kaseylum.com/), travels in a similar path; as we follow a young boy lost in his own dreams and ambitions, with quietly supernatural elements injecting a level of mystery that comes with almost every track on the record.

Stream the video below.
